javadoc: Action to add a domain file to version control in the repository.

methods.javadoc: Returns true if at least one of the provided domain files can be added to the repository.
methods.name: isEnabledForContext
methods.comment: Returns true if at least one of the provided domain files can be added to the repository.

methods.name: addToVersionControl
methods.comment:
Adds all the non-version controlled domain files to the repository from the 
 list of files from the DomainFileProvider.

name: VersionControlAddAction
comment: Action to add a domain file to version control in the repository.
